mapper.sql: id, bet_movie_id, bet_scence_id, status, start_day, end_day
mapper.insert:
insert into bet_scence_movie
id,
bet_movie_id,
bet_scence_id,
status,
start_day,
end_day,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{betMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update bet_scence_movie
bet_movie_id = #{betMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bet_scence_id = #{betScenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_day = #{startDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_day = #{endDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bet_scence_movie set bet_movie_id = #{betMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bet_scence_id = #{betScenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_day = #{startDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_day = #{endDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sb.* from bet_scence_movie sb left join bet_scence b on b.id = sb.bet_scence_id left join bet_movie m on m.id = sb.bet_movie_id where sb.status = 0
